name: Love, Fun, and Robots
description:
Oh no, two robots have been separated! Can you solve the puzzle to bring them back together?

Make use of various items such as: laser beams, levitation, and scanning for hidden objects in order to solve these short puzzles. Make sure to pick up any oil cans you see along the way... Robots love oil, they might even give you a new coat of paint if you collect enough ;)

Controls (even through I hope it's self explanatory):

Character 1: Move (A,D), Jump(W), use items (1,2,3)

Character 2: Move(LEFT, RIGHT), Jump (UP), use items(B,N,M)
